content: We have "office hours" on the schedule for the next thee hours. This is just a specific time for folks to drop in and ask questions or say hello. People can do that anytime of the week, but if you drop by during office hours your more likely to find others around.
Let's try something new and ask people to quickly introduce themselves and share what they are working on - or what questions they have for the community. (It's optional :grinning: )

I’m Elisabeth, of Brainwrap LLC. We are a small web development firm that has been around for over 20 years. We just took our first Backdrop site development live (hpsconsultingllc.com <http://hpsconsultingllc.com/> - check it out) with 2 more in production. The other 2 sites are much larger, one is e-commerce, the second is a large private high school site with e-commerce as well as a 3rd party payment solution and some custom needs. I’m very excited about both. You’ll see lots of questions for me in Zulip, since I go there before opening up an issue.

We are sheltering in place in Michigan.

Elisabeth Garbeil, MBA PMP
Brainwrap LLC
"Being on the web doesn't have to make your head hurt."
www.brainwrap.com
(810) 560-7181
egarbeil@brainwrap.com
Hi Elisabeth and welcome! That's so exciting about your new Backdrop site! If you have time (and want to) we'd love to see it in the showcase :) https://backdropcms.org/showcase
